delete-confirmation.title: Delete this contact? |||| Delete these contacts?
delete-confirmation.description-simple: This contact will be removed permanently from your Cozy. |||| These contacts will be removed permanently from your Cozy.
delete-confirmation.description-google: This contact will also be deleted from your Google address book. |||| These contacts will also be deleted from your Google address book.
delete-confirmation.description-mixed: These contacts will be removed permanently from your Cozy, the contacts linked to your Google account will also be deleted from your Google address book.

intent.creation_error: An error occured while trying to contact the other app. Please try again later?

manifest.short_description: Cozy Contacts helps you to save, secure and manage all your contacts from your Cozy.
manifest.long_description:
With Cozy Contacts you can:

* Add, edit and sort your contacts,
* Manage your groups of contacts,
* Make your sharing easier from Cozy Drive with your contacts,
* Synchronise your contacts from Google,
* And soon, synchronise your contacts from your mobile and other online services (iCloud, Facebook...)

apps.description: Required by the main menu to display the icons of the apps

contactsgroups.description: Required to manage groups of contacts

contactsAccounts.description: Required to link your contacts with your remote accounts

loading.fetching_contacts: Loading of your contacts, please wait.
